name: Sandro Lost His Soul
description:
Sandro the skull has lost his soul (and most of his body)! 
Help Sandro find his missing soul by fighting the soul-snatching wisps!
Collect as many soul fragments as you can to make Sandro whole again!

A top-down shooter made for the Godot Wild Jam 31. Theme: Something's missing.
Default controls: WASD to move. Spacebar to shoot. Change controls via Settings.

NOTE: PLEASE PLAY THE DOWNLOADABLE VERSION FOR THE BEST POSSIBLE EXPERIENCE! THE WEB VERSION MAY BE LAGGY.
